IntelMemoryMetrics.description: This resource shall be used to represent Intel Memory Metrics
IntelMemoryMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent Intel Memory Metrics

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BISTControllerFailCount.description: The number of BIST controller failures.
BISTControllerFailCount.longDescription: The number of BIST controller failures.

DoubleECCErrorsCount.description: The number of double ECC errors.
DoubleECCErrorsCount.longDescription: The number of double ECC errors.
